mapper.sql: id, name, pwd, number, entry_time, dept, position, create_time

update manager

pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

entry_time = #{entryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dept = #{dept,jdbcType=INTEGER},
